original_text: With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication, and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication.
korean_text: 땅의 임금들도 그와 더불어 음행하였고 땅에 사는 자들도 그 음행의 포도주에 취하였다 하고

sentences.original_text: With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication
and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 거민들이 그의 행음의 포도주에 취하게 되었다

sentences.original_text: with the wine of her fornication
